abstract: Apple appointed Oracle‘s Daniel Cooperman on Friday as its new general counsel, less than a year after the company replaced its former top lawyer, who is embroiled in a federal investigation into her role in the backdating of stock options and awards at the company.
lead_paragraph: Apple appointed Oracle‘s Daniel Cooperman on Friday as its new general counsel, less than a year after the company replaced its former top lawyer, who is embroiled in a federal investigation into her role in the backdating of stock options and awards at the company.

headline.main: Apple Hires Oracle Lawyer as General Counsel

abstract: A few iPhone owners found that Apple stores will help revive phones disabled by yesterday’s software update. But others still have iBricks.
snippet: A few iPhone owners found that Apple stores will help revive phones disabled by yesterday’s software update. But others still have iBricks.
lead_paragraph: Around the country iPhone owners continue to confront the effects of the software update Apple introduced yesterday. The lucky ones see a new icon for a wireless iTunes Music Store and a host of tweaks to the user interface. The unlucky ones own a shiny black piece of glass.

headline.main: More on Apple’s Latest Product, the iBrick
